title: The Only Choice
description: RELEASE ON HOLD. “Mommy, why don't I have a daddy?” My four-year-old daughter asks me.The dreaded question that no single mother ever wants to hear, that your child is curious about why you are only half of a whole family. I knew the day would come when she would ask about her father, but I still wasn't prepared.My daughter will forever be my only choice. However, Bo, the man I kept in the dark about fathering a daughter, is pushing his way back into my - no- our life. Now, I will have to guard both our hearts while I allow him to get to know the daughter that I mistakenly kept him from.But now I have a question for him.Will she be his only choice?
author: B.L. Olson
